verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came בִשְׁמוֹנִ֣ים <WH8084> and eightieth שָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year וְאַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> And it came to pass in the four מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֡ה <WH8141> year לְצֵ֣את <WH3318> were come out בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> after the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> of the land מִצְרַיִם֩ <WH4714> of Egypt בַּשָּׁנָ֨ה <WH8141> year הָרְבִיעִ֜ית <WH7243> in the fourth בְּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> in the month זִ֗ו <WH2099> Zif ה֚וּא <WH1931> which הַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> which [is] the second לִמְלֹ֥ךְ <WH4427> reign שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> of Solomon's עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> over Israel וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> that he began to build הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> the house לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְהַבַּ֗יִת <WH1004> And the house אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which בָּנָ֜ה <WH1129> built הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> which king שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> Solomon לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for the LORD שִׁשִּֽׁים־ <WH8346> thereof [was] threescore אַמָּ֥ה <WH520> cubits אָרְכּ֖וֹ <WH753> the length וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> thereof twenty רָחְבּ֑וֹ <WH7341> and the breadth וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> thereof thirty אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> cubits קוֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6967> [cubits] and the height

וְהָאוּלָ֗ם <WH197> And the porch עַל־ <WH5921> along פְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> before הֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> the temple הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> of the house עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> twenty אַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubits אָרְכּ֔וֹ <WH753> [was] the length עַל־ <WH5921> along פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> the front רֹ֣חַב <WH7341> thereof according to the breadth הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> of the house עֶ֧שֶׂר <WH6235> [and] ten בָּאַמָּ֛ה <WH520> cubits רָחְבּ֖וֹ <WH7341> [was] the breadth עַל־ <WH5921> along פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> the front הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> thereof before the house
וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> he made לַבָּ֔יִת <WH1004> And for the house חַלּוֹנֵ֖י <WH2474> windows שְׁקֻפִ֥ים <WH8261> lights אֲטֻמִֽים׃ <WH331> of narrow

וַיִּבֶן֩ <WH1129> he built עַל־ <WH5921> Against קִ֨יר <WH7023> And against the wall הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> of the house [יָצֹועַ כ] (יָצִ֙יעַ֙ <WH3326> bed ק) סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> round about אֶת־ <WH853> קִיר֤וֹת <WH7023> [against] the walls הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> of the house סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> round about לַֽהֵיכָ֖ל <WH1964> [both] of the temple וְלַדְּבִ֑יר <WH1687> and of the oracle וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> and he made צְלָע֖וֹת <WH6763> chambers סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

[הַיָּצֹועַ כ] (הַיָּצִ֨יעַ <WH3326> bed ק) הַתַּחְתֹּנָ֜ה <WH8481> The nethermost חָמֵ֧שׁ <WH2568> [was] five בָּאַמָּ֣ה <WH520> cubits רָחְבָּ֗הּ <WH7341> broad וְהַתִּֽיכֹנָה֙ <WH8484> and the middle שֵׁ֤שׁ <WH8337> [was] six בָּֽאַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubits רָחְבָּ֔הּ <WH7341> broad וְהַ֨שְּׁלִישִׁ֔ית <WH7992> and the third שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> [was] seven בָּאַמָּ֖ה <WH520> cubits רָחְבָּ֑הּ <WH7341> broad כִּ֡י <WH3588> for מִגְרָעוֹת֩ <WH4052> narrowed rests נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> he made לַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> the house סָבִיב֙ <WH5439> round about ח֔וּצָה <WH2351> for without [in the wall] of לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> because אֲחֹ֥ז <WH270> that [the beams] should not be fastened בְּקִֽירוֹת־ <WH7023> in the walls הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> of the house

וְהַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> And the house בְּהִבָּ֣נֹת֔וֹ <WH1129> when it was in building אֶֽבֶן־ <WH68> of stone שְׁלֵמָ֥ה <WH8003> made ready מַסָּ֖ע <WH4551> before it was brought נִבְנָ֑ה <WH1129> was built וּמַקָּב֤וֹת <WH4717> thither so that there was neither hammer וְהַגַּרְזֶן֙ <WH1631> nor axe כָּל־ <WH3605> any כְּלִ֣י <WH3627> [nor] any tool בַרְזֶ֔ל <WH1270> of iron לֹֽא־ <WH3808> neither נִשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> heard בַּבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> in the house בְּהִבָּנֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH1129> while it was in building

פֶּ֗תַח <WH6607> The door הַצֵּלָע֙ <WH6763> chamber הַתִּ֣יכֹנָ֔ה <WH8484> for the middle אֶל־ <WH413> about כֶּ֥תֶף <WH3802> side הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house הַיְמָנִ֑ית <WH3233> [was] in the right וּבְלוּלִּ֗ים <WH3883> with winding stairs יַֽעֲלוּ֙ <WH5927> and they went up עַל־ <WH5921> unto הַתִּ֣יכֹנָ֔ה <WH8484> into the middle וּמִן־ <WH4480> at הַתִּֽיכֹנָ֖ה <WH8484> [chamber] and out of the middle אֶל־ <WH413> to הַשְּׁלִשִֽׁים׃ <WH7992> into the third

וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> So he built אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> the house וַיְכַלֵּ֑הוּ <WH3615> and finished וַיִּסְפֹּ֤ן <WH5603> it and covered אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> the house גֵּבִ֔ים <WH1356> with beams וּשְׂדֵרֹ֖ת <WH7713> and boards בָּאֲרָזִֽים׃ <WH729> made of cedar

וַיִּ֤בֶן <WH1129> And [then] he built אֶת־ <WH853> [הַיָּצֹועַ כ] (הַיָּצִ֙יעַ֙ <WH3326> bed ק) עַל־ <WH5921> against כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> against all the house חָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> five אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> cubits קֽוֹמָת֑וֹ <WH6967> high וַיֶּאֱחֹ֥ז <WH270> and they rested אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> on the house בַּעֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> [with] timber אֲרָזִֽים׃ <WH730> of cedar פ
וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> came to Solomon לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הַבַּ֨יִת <WH1004> [Concerning] this house הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you בֹנֶ֗ה <WH1129> which thou art in building אִם־ <WH518> if תֵּלֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> will walk בְּחֻקֹּתַי֙ <WH2708> in my statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטַ֣י <WH4941> my judgments תַּֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> and execute וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֥ <WH8104> and keep אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִצְוֹתַ֖י <WH4687> all my commandments לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> walking בָּהֶ֑ם וַהֲקִמֹתִ֤י <WH6965> in them then will I perform אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרִי֙ <WH1697> my word אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> for אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> with thee which I spake אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֥ד <WH1732> unto David אָבִֽיךָ׃ <WH1> thy father

וְשָׁ֣כַנְתִּ֔י <WH7931> And I will dwell בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and will not אֶעֱזֹ֖ב <WH5800> and will not forsake אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel ס
וַיִּ֧בֶן <WH1129> built שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> So Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> the house וַיְכַלֵּֽהוּ׃ <WH3615> and finished

וַיִּבֶן֩ <WH1129> And he built אֶת־ <WH853> קִיר֨וֹת <WH7023> the walls הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> of the house מִבַּ֙יְתָה֙ <WH1004> within בְּצַלְע֣וֹת <WH6763> with boards אֲרָזִ֔ים <WH730> of cedar מִקַּרְקַ֤ע <WH7172> both the floor הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> of the house עַד־ <WH5704> against קִיר֣וֹת <WH7023> and the walls הַסִּפֻּ֔ן <WH5604> of the cieling צִפָּ֥ה <WH6823> [and] he covered עֵ֖ץ <WH6086> with wood מִבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> [them] on the inside וַיְצַ֛ף <WH6823> and covered אֶת־ <WH853> קַרְקַ֥ע <WH7172> the floor הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house בְּצַלְע֥וֹת <WH6763> with planks בְּרוֹשִֽׁים׃ <WH1265> of fir

וַיִּבֶן֩ <WH1129> And he built אֶת־ <WH853> עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> twenty אַמָּ֜ה <WH520> cubits [מִיַּרְכֹּותֵי כ] (מִֽיַּרְכְּתֵ֤י <WH3411> border ק) הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> of the house בְּצַלְע֣וֹת <WH6763> with boards אֲרָזִ֔ים <WH730> of cedar מִן־ <WH4480> both הַקַּרְקַ֖ע <WH7172> the floor עַד־ <WH5704> against הַקִּיר֑וֹת <WH7023> and the walls וַיִּ֤בֶן <WH1129> he even built לוֹ֙ מִבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> [them] for it within לִדְבִ֔יר <WH1687> [even] for the oracle לְקֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> [even] for the most הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6944> holy

וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> it was forty בָּאַמָּ֖ה <WH520> cubits הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> And the house ה֖וּא <WH1931> that הַהֵיכָ֥ל <WH1964> that [is] the temple לִפְנָֽי׃ <WH6440> front

וְאֶ֤רֶז <WH730> And the cedar אֶל־ <WH413> on הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> of the house פְּנִ֔ימָה <WH6441> within מִקְלַ֣עַת <WH4734> [was] carved פְּקָעִ֔ים <WH6497> with knops וּפְטוּרֵ֖י <WH6358> open צִצִּ֑ים <WH6731> flowers הַכֹּ֣ל <WH3605> all אֶ֔רֶז <WH730> all [was] cedar אֵ֥ין <WH369> there אֶ֖בֶן <WH68> there was no stone נִרְאָֽה׃ <WH7200> seen

וּדְבִ֧יר <WH1687> And the oracle בְּתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> in הַבַּ֛יִת <WH1004> the house מִפְּנִ֖ימָה <WH6441> within הֵכִ֑ין <WH3559> he prepared לְתִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> to set שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֖וֹן <WH727> there the ark בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְלִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> in the forepart הַדְּבִ֡יר <WH1687> And the oracle עֶשְׂרִים֩ <WH6242> [was] twenty אַמָּ֨ה <WH520> cubits אֹ֜רֶךְ <WH753> in length וְעֶשְׂרִ֧ים <WH6242> and twenty אַמָּ֣ה <WH520> cubits רֹ֗חַב <WH7341> in breadth וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> and twenty אַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubits קֽוֹמָת֔וֹ <WH6967> in the height וַיְצַפֵּ֖הוּ <WH6823> thereof and he overlaid זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold סָג֑וּר <WH5462> it with pure וַיְצַ֥ף <WH6823> and [so] covered מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> the altar אָֽרֶז׃ <WH730> [which was of] cedar

וַיְצַ֨ף <WH6823> overlaid שְׁלֹמֹ֧ה <WH8010> So Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֛יִת <WH1004> the house מִפְּנִ֖ימָה <WH6441> within זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold סָג֑וּר <WH5462> with pure וַיְעַבֵּ֞ר <WH5674> and he made a partition [בְּרַתִּיקֹות כ] (בְּרַתּוּקֹ֤ות <WH7572> chain ק) זָהָב֙ <WH2091> of gold לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַדְּבִ֔יר <WH1687> the oracle וַיְצַפֵּ֖הוּ <WH6823> and he overlaid זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> it with gold

וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הַבַּ֛יִת <WH1004> And the whole house צִפָּ֥ה <WH6823> he overlaid זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> with gold עַד־ <WH5704> until תֹּ֣ם <WH8552> until he had finished כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> all the house וְכָל־ <WH3605> the whole הַמִּזְבֵּ֥חַ <WH4196> also the whole altar אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> which לַדְּבִ֖יר <WH1687> that [was] by the oracle צִפָּ֥ה <WH6823> he overlaid זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> with gold

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> he made בַּדְּבִ֔יר <WH1687> And within the oracle שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> two כְרוּבִ֖ים <WH3742> cherubims עֲצֵי־ <WH6086> tree שָׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> [of] olive עֶ֥שֶׂר <WH6235> [each] ten אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> cubits קוֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6967> high

וְחָמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> And five אַמּ֗וֹת <WH520> cubits כְּנַ֤ף <WH3671> wing הַכְּרוּב֙ <WH3742> of the cherub הָֽאֶחָ֔ת <WH259> [was] the one וְחָמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> and five אַמּ֔וֹת <WH520> cubits כְּנַ֥ף <WH3671> wing הַכְּר֖וּב <WH3742> of the cherub הַשֵּׁנִ֑ית <WH8145> the other עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> [were] ten אַמּ֔וֹת <WH520> cubits מִקְצ֥וֹת <WH7098> from the uttermost part כְּנָפָ֖יו <WH3671> of the one wing וְעַד־ <WH5704> against קְצ֥וֹת <WH7098> unto the uttermost part כְּנָפָֽיו׃ <WH3671> of the other

וְעֶ֙שֶׂר֙ <WH6235> [was] ten בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits הַכְּר֖וּב <WH3742> cherub הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <WH8145> And the other מִדָּ֥ה <WH4060> measure אַחַ֛ת <WH259> [were] of one וְקֶ֥צֶב <WH7095> size אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> and one לִשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> both הַכְּרֻבִֽים׃ <WH3742> the cherubims

קוֹמַת֙ <WH6967> The height הַכְּר֣וּב <WH3742> cherub הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> of the one עֶ֖שֶׂר <WH6235> [was] ten בָּֽאַמָּ֑ה <WH520> cubits וְכֵ֖ן <WH3651> and so הַכְּר֥וּב <WH3742> cherub הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃ <WH8145> and so [was it] of the other
